newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: PRESS DIGEST - S.Korean newspapers - April 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - S.Korean newspapers - April 1.

text.p: The following is a summary of major stories in leading South Korean newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Seoul. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.
- Foreign equity ceilings expanded: Venture businesses to be promoted to revitalise economy.
- The Kumho Group said that it would take over Miwon Petrochemical Corp, a subsidiary of the Miwon Group.
- The government announced the lifting of the ban on rice aid to North Korea, ending the 18-month-long sanction imposed in September 1995.
